SELECT cust_no, cust_type, cust_name, cust_name_short, cust_reg_person, man_name, man_tel, man_job FROM cust_master inner join cust_man on cust_no=man_cust_no WHERE 1=1
and cust_name like '%'||'${custName}'||'%'
and (cust_name like '%'||'${custName}'||'%' and cust_type='영업')
and (cust_name like '%'||'${custName}'||'%' and cust_type='운영')
and (cust_name like '%'||'${custName}'||'%' and cust_type='해지')
and (cust_name like '%'||'${custName}'||'%' and cust_type='수행')
and (cust_name like '%'||'${custName}'||'%' and cust_type='협력')
ORDER BY cust_no ASC

SELECT cust_no, cust_type, cust_reg_date, cust_reg_person, cust_name, cust_name_short, cust_addr, cust_homepage, man_name, man_tel, man_email, man_job, cust_memo, cust_create_time, cust_update_time FROM cust_master inner join cust_man on cust_no = man_cust_no WHERE cust_name = #{custName} or cust_name_short=#{custNameShort }
SELECT cust_no FROM cust_master WHERE ROWNUM =1 ORDER BY cust_no DESC
